name: Pumpkin Blitz
description:
Collect that candy and get it to the tote bag at the end of the level. Mind the ghosts and other sharp and pointy objects in the way.

W,A,S,D to move. R to restart. Getting chopped or bitten will land you back at the beginning of the level. 

Music in the background from https://www.fesliyanstudios.com
